job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstronguResponsibilitiesustrongpulliDevelop highlevel solution architectures and work with our offshore team of bigdata engineers and decision science analysts to build test and assess models that predict and optimize business outcomes based on a clients success criteria liliCreate sophisticated yet simple interpretations and communicate insights to clients that lead to quantifiable business impact liliBuild relationships with clients by understanding their stated but more importantly latent needs liliWork closely with offshore delivery managers to ensure a seamless communication and delivery liulpbrppstronguThe ideal candidate should have ustrongpulliStrong programming skills in any one or more programming languages like Python and CC liliSound fundamentals of data structures algorithms and objectoriented programming lilistrongHandson experience with any one popular deep learning framework like TensorFlow PyTorch etc strongliliExperience in implementing strongDeep Learning Solutions Computer Vision NLP etc strongliliAbility to quickly learn and communicate the latest findings in AI research liliCreative thinking for leveraging machine learning to build endtoend intelligent software systems liliA pleasantly forceful personality and charismatic communication style liliSomeone who will raise the average effectiveness of the team and has demonstrated exceptional abilities in some area of their life In short we are looking for a Difference Makernbspliul
